trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static predefined <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um conjunto de valores estáticos predefinidos <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font.
trans-unit.target: Ampliação de uma fonte descreve o grau ao qual um formulário de fonte é estendido da sua taxa de proporção normal, que é a largura altura especificada para os glifos na fonte original.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches> values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches> valores correspondem do `usWidthClass` definição no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] especificação.

trans-unit.source: The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9.
trans-unit.target: O `usWidthClass` representa um valor inteiro entre 1 e 9.

trans-unit.source: Lower numeric values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths.
trans-unit.target: Valores numéricos inferiores indicam mais estreitas larguras; valores mais altos indicam larguras mais ampla.

trans-unit.source: Font stretch
trans-unit.target: Ampliação de fonte

trans-unit.source: usWidthClass
trans-unit.target: usWidthClass

trans-unit.source: % of normal
trans-unit.target: % normal

trans-unit.source: For more information on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` valor, consulte o ["Tabelas de arquivo fonte"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) seção o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] especificação.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a condensed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> condensado.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a condensed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa um condensado <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A> represents 75% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A> representa a 75% da taxa de proporção normal do formulário de fonte.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an expanded <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> expandido.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an expanded <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa um expandido <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A> represents 125% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A> representa 125% da taxa de proporção normal do formulário de fonte.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an extra-condensed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> extracondensado.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an extra-condensed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa um extra condensado <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A> represents 62.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A> representa 62,5% da taxa de proporção normal do formulário de fonte.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an extra-expanded <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> extraexpandido.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an extra-expanded <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa um extra expandido <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A> represents 150% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A> representa a 150% da taxa de proporção normal do formulário de fonte.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a medium <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um meio <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a medium <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa uma mídia <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A> represents the normal (100%) aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A> representa a taxa de proporção de (100%) normal do formulário de fonte.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A> is equivalent to the value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A> é equivalente ao valor de <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a normal <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> normal.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a normal <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa um normal <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A> represents the normal (100%) aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A> representa a taxa de proporção de (100%) normal do formulário de fonte.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A> is equivalent to the value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A> é equivalente ao valor de <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semi-condensed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> semicondensado.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a semi-condensed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa um semicondensado <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A> represents 87.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A> representa 87,5% da taxa de proporção normal do formulário de fonte.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semi-expanded <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> semiexpandido.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a semi-expanded <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa um semiexpandido <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A> represents 112.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A> representa 112.5% da taxa de proporção normal do formulário de fonte.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an ultra-condensed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> ultracondensado.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an ultra-condensed <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa um ultracondensado <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A> represents 50% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A> representa a 50% da taxa de proporção normal do formulário de fonte.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an ultra-expanded <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> ultraexpandido.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an ultra-expanded <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa um excelente expandido <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A> represents 200% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A> representa a 200% da taxa de proporção normal do formulário de fonte.
